explains: v. （模仿模特在 T 形台上的姿态）随音乐跳舞
wordGroup: in vogue 正在流行；正时兴

sentences.en: Pale colours are much more in vogue than autumnal bronzes and coppers.
sentences.cn: 浅色比秋季的古铜色和紫铜色更为流行。

sentences.en: Despite the vogue for so-called health teas, there is no evidence that they are any healthier.
sentences.cn: 尽管所谓的保健茶成了时尚，但并没有证据表明这种茶更有益于健康。

sentences.en: Indigenous foods like salt marsh lamb are in vogue.
sentences.cn: 像盐沼羊肉这样的本土食物正在流行。
